Navtext.logline: How many movies can you watch in a day?
Navtext.l1: Enter the names, duration, and all the showtimes of the movies you're interested in.
Navtext.l2: Once you've entered all the information, click Schedule.
Navtext.l3: The system will calculate all possible viewing schedules, from most to least, with each showtime being at least 2 hours apart and not overlapping.
